    (package private) Connectivity
    tournamentValidation.l_connectivity
    l_connectivity refers to connectivity object l_mapList refers to list of maps specified in the userCommand l_behaviourList refers to list of behaviors specified in the userCommand l_gameCount refers to number of games specified in the userCommand l_roundCount refers to the number of rounds specified in the userCommand gameEngine is an instance of GameEngine class d_gameResult stores the results of all the games in the tournament d_gameplayerCommand stores the setPlayer/gameplayer command
